name: Snake snake
description:
Snake snake is a game inspired by, you guessed it, Snake!

In this game, you play as the ball the snake always tries to eat, kind of... but your goal is to not fall off the 'snake'!

This game features:

  • Procedurally generated levels;
  • Color theme shop;
  • Full keyboard support (no mouse required);
  • Save system (prefabs, so you might lose progress if you uninstall or play in the browser only);

This is just a little project I created in a couple of days to try out some things so I probably won't be working on it anymore, but feedback is greatly appreciated!
